title: Trollfs, a FUSE prank: even the Unix programmers just want to have fun
author: gbon
content: readme.md description:yes, know, sometimes 'm horrible person, even unix programmers want have fun. :-)features:" trollfs permits create "overmount" fake -memory file system (using fuse) reproduce almost exactly structure the sub-tree present the mount point, , for each read request returns fake data instead the real content, payload is freely configurable creating o modifying files present the payloads' directory. file created that directory, an extension related one more real files present the original directory, be used fake data".prerequisites:c++11 compiler;libfuselibmagictested :ubuntu 16.10debian 7.11 (wheezy)installation:launch configure script:./configurecompile program:install program the man page (optional):sudo installinstructions: the man page included the release.
